testcase.name: We can extend simple objects with pubsub cap.
objects can subscribe to a pubsub instance
objects can unsubscribe from a pubsub instance
objects get notified of publisehd topics
objects get notified of publisehd topics
a handler can abort the publish loop
should route all notices to a single handler if subscribed to the * channel
should execute in the context of the publisher
shoud include all event props into the options parameter
each callback should have a cloned options object
